msg: o Refactor main page like m2 site.

author: rgardler
msg: The locationmap module now throws and exception if a null is returned. This is logged in the error.log file. We should really create a custom exception type for better filtering of the log, but this is a start.
(interestingly it has turned up a few problems with the current lm useage)
Unfortunately we still fail with "access denied" (this is a Cocoon issue) but at least our logs now tell us something meaningful.
